channel.title: How to make command make a player talk
channel.description: how do I make it so if a player uses a certain command it makes them say something above there head. Can anyone post the coding?

item.title: How to make command make a player talk
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

I didn’t mean yell into yell channel, or anything like that. I mean you know how when you make the yell command you put yell(“then text here”) I need to know what to replace ‘yell’ with liek what is it, is it playerText(“then text here”) or what?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make command make a player talk
item.dc:creator: @iamguy iamguy
item.description:
@iamguy wrote:

ok, go to your client.java and search for something like this “::[something to do with auto]” like it will have something in that code that says “auto”
then just replace that whole thing with the “::setsay [words here] [operation here]”

Read full topic
